title: AI-powered tools enable faster stroke diagnosis and treatment within the critical golden hour in India
description: Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing stroke care in India by accelerating diagnosis and treatment within the critical "golden hour." AI-powered systems analyze brain scans rapidly, enabling faster decisions on interventions like clot-busting drugs or thrombectomy. This technology, extending to remote areas via telestroke services, promises to improve survival rates and reduce long-term disability, making stroke care more efficient and accessible.
content:

description: The aim is to establish better coordination between astronauts, robotic missions, and artificial intelligence.

title: Empowering the Ordinary: Sharad Pawar's Call for Change
description: NCP (SP) president Sharad Pawar emphasizes that talent and leadership aren't exclusive to privileged backgrounds. At the Sharad Pawar Inspire Fellowship award ceremony, he advocates supporting individuals from ordinary families. Highlighting artificial intelligence in agriculture, Pawar champions institutional strength for sustained change and urges addressing women's issues in Maharashtra.
content:
In a powerful address, NCP (SP) president Sharad Pawar underlined the significance of identifying and backing talented individuals from ordinary backgrounds, asserting that leadership isn't confined to the privileged.
